report.title: Habitat types search
report.query: select #columns# from cache_termlists_terms t left join cache_termlists_terms ts on ts.meaning_id=t.meaning_id where t.termlist_id in (992, 993, 994) and t.preferred=true and ts.preferred=false and (t.term ilike '%#search#%' or ts.term ilike '%#search#%') #idlist# #order_by#
